title: 关于/summon指令的问题
author: MCer0

replies.author: 小白勇者
replies.txt_content: 您好,请将命令修改为/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Profession:0,CustomName:"1",CustomNameVisible:1,Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:1}],Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:1,buy:{id:1,Count:1,Damage:0},sell:{id:6,Count:1,Damage:2}}]}}若您还有任何其它疑问请向我发送消息,我会尽量为您解答。

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: id不能写6 2会被系统认为错误ID， 你可以尝试改成id:6,Date:2

replies.author: AngryCreeper
replies.txt_content: 应该改成{id:6,Damage:2s}单位应该小写吧。

replies.author: mc、肉肉
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
